attributes.action: Re-Open Ford Airfield in Sussex for Civil Flying
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ford Airfield is longer used as an airfield, a large outdoor market is open on sundays.
A former RAF Hawker Hunter jet aircraft is situated at the eastern entrance as gate guardian.

However, the runway is still there and I would like to see it re-opened for civil flying. This would be popular with aviation enthusiasts all over the country and would be a boost to the local area.
